ModMetaData.name: Proximity Fuze (近炸引信)
ModMetaData.author: ordpus
ModMetaData.description:
Make the mines gain the ability of proximity fuze, the detection range can be adjusted.
让地雷拥有近炸引信，探测范围可以设置。
If you add this mod in mid-game, please click the register button in the mod setting. Also, when you changed the radius factor, please click the same button to apply the setting to existing mines. If you want to remove this mod, please click the remove mod button at the bottom of the mod setting.
如果您想要在游玩中加入此mod，请在mod设置里点击注册设置。如果您更改了范围参数，也请单击此按钮来把应用设置到已存的地雷上。 如果您想要移除此mod，请单击在mod设置最下面的移除mod按钮。
08-19-2021 Fixed bug that the detection radius will be reset after load game 修复了探测范围在读取游戏之后会重置的bug
